Container.Name: tvheadend
Container.Overview:
This is the stable branch of Tvheadend installed from the Tvheadend apt-repository. Version: 4.0.7 Tvheadend is a TV streaming server for Linux supporting DVB-S, DVB-S2, DVB-C, DVB-T, ATSC, IPTV, SAT>IP and HDHomeRun as input sources.
The Analog video (V4L) is supported directly up to version 3.4. In recent version, the pipe:// source (in IPTV network) might be used to obtain the MPEG-TS stream generated by ffmpeg/libav from a V4L device.
